trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control that displays a frame around a group of controls with an optional caption.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个 Windows 控件，该控件显示围绕一组具有可选标题的控件的框架。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> displays a frame around a group of controls with or without a caption.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>显示围绕一组控件与或无标题的框架。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> to logically group a collection of controls on a form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>以进行逻辑分组的窗体上的控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The group box is a container control that can be used to define groups of controls.
trans-unit.target: 分组框是可以用于定义控件组的一个容器控件。

trans-unit.source: The typical use for a group box is to contain a logical group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 分组框的典型用途是包含的逻辑组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: If you have two group boxes, each of which contain several option buttons (also known as radio buttons), each group of buttons is mutually exclusive, setting one option value per group.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有两个组框中，其中每个包含多个选项按钮 （也称为单选按钮），按钮的每个组是每个组的互相排斥，则设置一个选项值。

trans-unit.source: You can add controls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将控件添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Only controls that are contained within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control can be selected or receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控件可以选择或接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: The complete <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> itself cannot be selected or receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 完整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>本身不能同时选择或接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how this control responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods, see the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> members: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此控件如何响应的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>方法，请参阅以下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>成员： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> cannot display a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>无法显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: If you need a control similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> that can contain a scroll bar, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要一个控件类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>，可以包含滚动条，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example instantiates and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> and two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例实例化并创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>和两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: The radio buttons are added to the group box and the group box is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 单选按钮添加到组框和组框中添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property is set to `false` when a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> is created.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>属性设置为`false`新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>创建。

trans-unit.source: The group box has an initial height of 100 pixels and width of 200 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 组中有 100 个像素的初始高度和宽度的 200 像素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example instantiates and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> and two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例实例化并创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>和两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: The option buttons (also known as radio buttons) are added to the group box, and the group box is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: （也称为单选按钮） 中的选项按钮添加到组框中，并且组框添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control will allow drag-and-drop operations and events to be used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否允许使用拖放操作和事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow drag-and-drop operations and events to be used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 则允许使用拖放操作和事件；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> resizes based on its contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 是否根据其内容调整大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> automatically resizes based on its contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 根据其内容自动调整大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSize" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> named `GroupBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>名为`GroupBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> behaves when its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize" /> property is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置启用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 属性时 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize" /> 的行为方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 创建一个新的辅助功能对象。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> 的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式调用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> 方法，则在引用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> 属性时将会调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method for an example of how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以举例说明如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 获取创建控件句柄时所需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含创建控件的句柄时所需的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> structure that contains the default padding settings for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 控件的默认边距设置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> with all its edges set to three pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />，其所有边缘均设置为三个像素。

trans-unit.source: The default padding indicates the padding on each side of the control is three pixels.
trans-unit.target: 默认值填充表示控件的每一侧的填充为三个像素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a rectangle that represents the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 的维度的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> with the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 的维度的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户双击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the group box control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置组框控件的平面样式外观。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Standard" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Standard" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.FlatStyle%2A> value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.System> does not receive mouse events.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.FlatStyle%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.System>不接收鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example instantiates and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> and two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例实例化并创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>和两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: The option buttons (also known as radio buttons) are added to the group box and the group box is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: （也称为单选按钮） 中的选项按钮添加到组框和组框中添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a key while the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 控件具有焦点并且用户按任意键时发生。

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot get focus, this event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控件无法获得焦点，永远不会引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a key while the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 控件具有焦点并且用户按任意键时发生。

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot get focus, this event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控件无法获得焦点，永远不会引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a key while the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 控件有焦点并且用户松开某个键时发生。

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot get focus, this event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控件无法获得焦点，永远不会引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用鼠标单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用鼠标双击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针位于控件上方并且用户按下鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the control.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针进入控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针离开控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over the control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将鼠标指针移至控件上方时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a mouse button while the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针位于控件上方并且用户松开鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that indicates the height and width of the scaled control.
trans-unit.target: 指示已缩放控件的高度和宽度的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values that indicates how the control should be scaled.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值之一，用于指示控件的缩放方式。

trans-unit.source: Scales the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> by the specified factor and scaling instruction.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定因子和缩放说明缩放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" />。

trans-unit.source: If the control is top level, this method will not scale the control's location.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件为顶级，则此方法将不缩放控件的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不缩放子控件或自动调整大小的控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以忽略任何方向的缩放通过更改的值`specified`参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can press the TAB key to give the focus to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户按 Tab 键后是否可以使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" /> 获得焦点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow the user to press the TAB key to give the focus to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 则允许用户通过按 Tab 键将焦点转至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.TabStop%2A> property to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 虽然可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.TabStop%2A>属性`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控件不能接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.TabStop" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.TabStop" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此控件关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 与该控件关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 不应重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />（如果有）；如果 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 未命名，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer" /> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer" /> 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />应使用类来执行兼容版本 1.0 和 1.1 文本呈现。

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 中;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性旨在提供 visual Windows 窗体控件之间的兼容性，呈现文本使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]应用程序执行自定义文本呈现使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不正在升级从[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，因此，建议你停`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本效果更好，并提高的国际字体支持。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类用于执行所有文本呈现。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算字符间距和自动换行从的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类呈现文本中，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>显示不同于应用程序中的其他文本。

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此不兼容性，你可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性`true`对特定的控件。

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的参数替换`true`。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Windows 消息。
